PHRASE.LANG: Welcome to the Gifting Machine! As an owner of the Diamond Beach Mansion you will be rewarded all of these items and have the ability to gift them to your friends as well. Go spread the wealth and purchase your very own Diamond Beach Mansion!

Bienvenue à la machine Gifting! En tant que propriétaire du Diamond Beach Château vous serez récompensé de tous ces éléments et ont la capacité de les cadeau à vos amis ainsi. Aller répartir la richesse et l'achat de votre propre Diamond Beach Château!

Welcome to the Gifting Machine! As an owner of the Diamond Beach Mansion you will be rewarded all of these items and have the ability to gift them to your friends as well. Go spread the wealth and purchase your very own Diamond Beach Mansion!
